text: I created a filter module for a table in HubDB. For some reason, my conditional logic isn't working and I can't figure out in the code where I went wrong. In simple terms, I want the ability for the user to only see specific items from my list based on their initial dropdown menu selection, if that makes sense. I attached the HubL. Can someone guide me?
It looks like you don’t have a positive result? Your `if` statement is immediately followed by your `else` – that’s the thing that jumps out at me!
